raw_response: The trust hierarchy ranks information sources by reliability: tool-verified facts > rag_search results > Memory graph > training knowledge. When sources conflict, the higher-ranked source is used, as it is more likely to be current and accurate. This includes dates — tool-verified timestamps are correct, even if they differ from training data.

When sources conflict, the higher-ranked source is used, as it is more likely to be current and accurate. This includes dates — tool-verified timestamps are correct, even if they differ from training data.
